meanings.sent1: The nonsymmetrical shapes in the art class were all unique.
meanings.sent2: The artist intentionally created a nonsymmetrical design to stand out.
meanings.sent3: The nonsymmetrical cake looked like it had melted in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsymmetrical haircut was a bold statement of individuality.
meanings.sent5: The nonsymmetrical pattern on the fabric caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The nonsymmetrical building had a quirky charm to it.
meanings.sent2: The flower petals were nonsymmetrical, giving them a natural look.
meanings.sent3: The nonsymmetrical puzzle pieces made completing the jigsaw even more challenging.
meanings.sent4: His nonsymmetrical handwriting was difficult to read but had character.
meanings.sent5: The nonsymmetrical arrangement of the furniture made the room feel cozy.

meanings.sent1: The nonsymmetrical mirror distorted her reflection.
meanings.sent2: The nonsymmetrical distribution of colors made the painting dynamic.
meanings.sent3: The nonsymmetrical garden path led to unexpected discoveries.
meanings.sent4: The nonsymmetrical clouds in the sky resembled playful animals.
meanings.sent5: The nonsymmetrical face of the clock added a touch of whimsy to the room.
